verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> about הַמִּצְוָ֥ה <S%H4687><s%> this commandment הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> O הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> And now O ye priests

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמְע֡וּ <S%H8085><s%> If ye will not hear וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not תָשִׂ֨ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and if ye will not lay עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵ֜ב <S%H3820><s%> [it] to heart לָתֵ֧ת <S%H5414><s%> to give כָּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory לִשְׁמִ֗י <S%H8034><s%> unto my name אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <S%H7971><s%> I will even send בָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּאֵרָ֔ה <S%H3994><s%> a curse וְאָרוֹתִ֖י <S%H779><s%> upon you and I will curse אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּרְכֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1293><s%> your blessings וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> and indeed אָרוֹתִ֔יהָ <S%H779><s%> yea I have cursed כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> them because אֵינְכֶ֖ם <S%H369><s%> are not שָׂמִ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> them already because ye do not lay עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> [it] to heart

הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am going גֹעֵ֤ר <S%H1605><s%> Behold I will corrupt לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזֶּ֔רַע <S%H2233><s%> your seed וְזֵרִ֤יתִי <S%H2219><s%> and spread פֶ֙רֶשׁ֙ <S%H6569><s%> dung עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> upon your faces פֶּ֖רֶשׁ <S%H6569><s%> [even] the dung חַגֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H2282><s%> of your solemn feasts וְנָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and [one] shall take you away אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> then

וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> And ye shall know כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for שִׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> that I have sent אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <S%H4687><s%> this commandment הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לִֽהְי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> may continue בְּרִיתִי֙ <S%H1285><s%> unto you that my covenant אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with לֵוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> might be with Levi אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

בְּרִיתִ֣י ׀ <S%H1285><s%> My covenant הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for הַֽחַיִּים֙ <S%H2416><s%> was with him of life וְהַ֨שָּׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> and peace וָאֶתְּנֵֽם־ <S%H5414><s%> and I gave ל֥וֹ מוֹרָ֖א <S%H4172><s%> them to him [for] the fear וַיִּֽירָאֵ֑נִי <S%H3372><s%> wherewith he feared וּמִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> my name נִחַ֥ת <S%H2865><s%> me and was afraid הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

תּוֹרַ֤ת <S%H8451><s%> The law אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> of truth הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> was in בְּפִ֔יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> was in his mouth וְעַוְלָ֖ה <S%H5766><s%> and iniquity לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not נִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> was not found בִשְׂפָתָ֑יו <S%H8193><s%> in his lips בְּשָׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> with me in peace וּבְמִישׁוֹר֙ <S%H4334><s%> and equity הָלַ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> he walked אִתִּ֔י <S%H854><s%> for וְרַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> many הֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> away מֵעָוֹֽן׃ <S%H5771><s%> from iniquity

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For שִׂפְתֵ֤י <S%H8193><s%> lips כֹהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> For the priest's יִשְׁמְרוּ־ <S%H8104><s%> should keep דַ֔עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge וְתוֹרָ֖ה <S%H8451><s%> the law יְבַקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> and they should seek מִפִּ֑יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> at his mouth כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> for he [is] the messenger יְהוָֽה־ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you סַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5493><s%> But ye are departed מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> out of the way הִכְשַׁלְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3782><s%> to stumble רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> ye have caused many בַּתּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> at the law שִֽׁחַתֶּם֙ <S%H7843><s%> ye have corrupted בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> Therefore have I also made אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> נִבְזִ֥ים <S%H959><s%> you contemptible וּשְׁפָלִ֖ים <S%H8217><s%> and base לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> before all the people כְּפִ֗י <S%H6310><s%> according אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after אֵֽינְכֶם֙ <S%H369><s%> are not שֹׁמְרִ֣ים <S%H8104><s%> as ye have not kept אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for דְּרָכַ֔י <S%H1870><s%> my ways וְנֹשְׂאִ֥ים <S%H5375><s%> are showing פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> accept בַּתּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> in the law פ

הֲל֨וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אָ֤ב <S%H1><s%> fathers אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> Have we not all one לְכֻלָּ֔נוּ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲל֛וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God אֶֽחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> have one בְּרָאָ֑נוּ <S%H1254><s%> created מַדּ֗וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why נִבְגַּד֙ <S%H898><s%> us? why do we deal treacherously אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man בְּאָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> against his brother לְחַלֵּ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> by profaning בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant אֲבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> fathers

בָּגְדָ֣ה <S%H898><s%> hath dealt treacherously יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְתוֹעֵבָ֛ה <S%H8441><s%> and an abomination נֶעֶשְׂתָ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> is committed בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וּבִירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for חִלֵּ֣ל <S%H2490><s%> hath profaned יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> for Judah קֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holiness יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָהֵ֔ב <S%H157><s%> which he loved וּבָעַ֖ל <S%H1166><s%> and hath married בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> god נֵכָֽר׃ <S%H5236><s%> of a strange

יַכְרֵ֨ת <S%H3772><s%> will cut off יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לָאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲשֶׂ֙נָּה֙ <S%H6213><s%> that doeth עֵ֣ר <S%H5782><s%> this the master וְעֹנֶ֔ה <S%H6030><s%> and the scholar מֵאָהֳלֵ֖י <S%H168><s%> out of the tabernacles יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וּמַגִּ֣ישׁ <S%H5066><s%> and him that offereth מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> an offering לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts פ

וְזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise שֵׁנִ֣ית <S%H8145><s%> again תַּֽעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> And this have ye done כַּסּ֤וֹת <S%H3680><s%> covering דִּמְעָה֙ <S%H1832><s%> with tears אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּכִ֖י <S%H1065><s%> with weeping וַֽאֲנָקָ֑ה <S%H603><s%> and with crying out מֵאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer פְּנוֹת֙ <S%H6437><s%> insomuch that he regardeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> not the offering וְלָקַ֥חַת <S%H3947><s%> any more or receiveth רָצ֖וֹן <S%H7522><s%> [it] with good will מִיֶּדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> at your hand

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> Yet ye say עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For מָ֑ה <S%H4100><s%> what עַ֡ל <S%H5921><s%> and כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הֵעִ֨יד <S%H5749><s%> hath been witness בֵּינְךָ֜ <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵ֣ין ׀ <S%H996><s%> between אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> between thee and the wife נְעוּרֶ֗יךָ <S%H5271><s%> of thy youth אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you בָּגַ֣דְתָּה <S%H898><s%> against whom thou hast dealt treacherously בָּ֔הּ וְהִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> she חֲבֶרְתְּךָ֖ <S%H2278><s%> yet [is] she thy companion וְאֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> and the wife בְּרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1285><s%> of thy covenant

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> one עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> And did not he make וּשְׁאָ֥ר <S%H7605><s%> remnant ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> of the spirit ל֔וֹ וּמָה֙ <S%H4100><s%> and what הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> did one מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> was seeking זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> a godly וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H8104><s%> Therefore take heed בְּר֣וּחֲכֶ֔ם <S%H7307><s%> to your spirit וּבְאֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> against the wife נְעוּרֶ֖יךָ <S%H5271><s%> of his youth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יִבְגֹּֽד׃ <S%H898><s%> and let none deal treacherously

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׂנֵ֣א <S%H8130><s%> that he hateth שַׁלַּ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> putting away אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְכִסָּ֤ה <S%H3680><s%> for [one] covereth חָמָס֙ <S%H2555><s%> violence עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לְבוּשׁ֔וֹ <S%H3830><s%> with his garment אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H8104><s%> therefore take heed בְּרוּחֲכֶ֖ם <S%H7307><s%> to your spirit וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִבְגֹּֽדוּ׃ <S%H898><s%> that ye deal not treacherously ס

הוֹגַעְתֶּ֤ם <S%H3021><s%> Ye have wearied יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּדִבְרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1697><s%> with your words וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> Yet ye say בַּמָּ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How הוֹגָ֑עְנוּ <S%H3021><s%> Wherein have we wearied בֶּאֱמָרְכֶ֗ם <S%H559><s%> [him]? When ye say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone עֹ֨שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> Every one that doeth רָ֜ע <S%H7451><s%> evil ט֣וֹב ׀ <S%H2896><s%> [is] good בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּבָהֶם֙ ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He חָפֵ֔ץ <S%H2654><s%> and he delighteth א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> Where אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> in them or Where [is] the God הַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> adversary
